title: Derive the Hilbert space axioms from ZFC set theory
content: Before introducing the 18 axioms for Hilbert space, we first prove them as the conclusions of theorems ~ axhilex-zf through ~ axhcompl-zf , using ZFC set theory only. These show that if we are given a known, fixed Hilbert space ` U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. ` that satisfies their hypotheses, then we can derive the Hilbert space axioms as theorems of ZFC set theory. In practice, in order to use these theorems to convert the Hilbert Space explorer to a ZFC-only subtheory, we would also have to provide definitions for the 3 (otherwise primitive) class constants ` +h ` , ` .h ` , and ` .ih ` before ~ df-hnorm above. See also the comment in ~ ax-hilex .

blocks.name: axhilex-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-hilex from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: axhv0cl-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-hv0cl from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhv0cl-zf(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0v, chba)
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c0, chlo)
} = {
  ax-mp(wcel(c0v, chba), wcel(c0, chlo))
  hl0cl(c0, c0v, chba)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c0), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  eqtr4i(c0v, cfv(cn0v, c0), cfv(cn0v, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c0, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhv0cl-zf(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ 0h ‚àà ~H
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà CHilOLD
} = {
  ax-mp(0h ‚àà ~H, c0 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hl0cl(c0, c0v, chba)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c0), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c0, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  eqtr4i(c0v, (0vec ` c0), (0vec ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c0, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
}

blocks.name: axhvaddid-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-hvaddid from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhvaddid-zf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(c0, cva, c0v), c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c1, chlo)
} = {
  mpan(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(c0, cva, c0v), c0), wcel(c1, chlo))
  hladdid(c1, c0, chba, cva, c0v)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c1), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  h2hva(c1)
  hlnvi(c1)
  eqtr4i(c0v, cfv(cn0v, c1), cfv(cn0v, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhvaddid-zf(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ~H ‚Üí(c0[+h]0h)= c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà CHilOLD
} = {
  mpan(c0 ‚àà ~H, (c0[+h]0h)= c0, c1 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hladdid(c1, c0, chba, cva, c0v)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c1), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  h2hva(c1)
  hlnvi(c1)
  eqtr4i(c0v, (0vec ` c1), (0vec ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c1, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
}

blocks.name: axhvdistr1-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-hvdistr1 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhvdistr1-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csm, co(c1, cva, c2)), co(co(c0, csm, c1), cva, co(c0, csm, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c3, chlo)
} = {
  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(c0, csm, co(c1, cva, c2)), co(co(c0, csm, c1), cva, co(c0, csm, c2))), wcel(c3, chlo))
  hldi(c3, c0, c1, chba, c2, csm, cva)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c3), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  h2hva(c3)
  h2hsm(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhvdistr1-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H)‚Üí(c0[.h](c1[+h]c2))=((c0[.h]c1)[+h](c0[.h]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà CHilOLD
} = {
  mpan((c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H), (c0[.h](c1[+h]c2))=((c0[.h]c1)[+h](c0[.h]c2)), c3 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hldi(c3, c0, c1, chba, c2, csm, cva)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c3), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  h2hva(c3)
  h2hsm(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}

blocks.name: axhvdistr2-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-hvdistr2 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhvdistr2-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), csm, c2), co(co(c0, csm, c2), cva, co(c1, csm, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c3, chlo)
} = {
  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), csm, c2), co(co(c0, csm, c2), cva, co(c1, csm, c2))), wcel(c3, chlo))
  hldir(c3, c0, c1, c2, chba, csm, cva)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c3), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  h2hva(c3)
  h2hsm(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhvdistr2-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H)‚Üí((c0[+]c1)[.h]c2)=((c0[.h]c2)[+h](c1[.h]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà CHilOLD
} = {
  mpan((c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H), ((c0[+]c1)[.h]c2)=((c0[.h]c2)[+h](c1[.h]c2)), c3 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hldir(c3, c0, c1, c2, chba, csm, cva)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c3), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  h2hva(c3)
  h2hsm(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}

blocks.name: axhvmul0-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-hvmul0 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhvmul0-zf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(nat0, csm, c0), c0v))
  -| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c1, chlo)
} = {
  mpan(wcel(c0, chba), wceq(co(nat0, csm, c0), c0v), wcel(c1, chlo))
  hlmul0(c1, c0, chba, csm, c0v)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c1), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  h2hsm(c1)
  hlnvi(c1)
  eqtr4i(c0v, cfv(cn0v, c1), cfv(cn0v, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhvmul0-zf(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ~H ‚Üí(0[.h]c0)= 0h)
  ‚ä£ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà CHilOLD
} = {
  mpan(c0 ‚àà ~H, (0[.h]c0)= 0h, c1 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hlmul0(c1, c0, chba, csm, c0v)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c1), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  h2hsm(c1)
  hlnvi(c1)
  eqtr4i(c0v, (0vec ` c1), (0vec ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c1, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
}

blocks.name: axhis2-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-his2 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhis2-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, cva, c1), csp, c2), co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, co(c1, csp, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c3, chlo)
  -| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c3))
} = {
  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, cva, c1), csp, c2), co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, co(c1, csp, c2))), wcel(c3, chlo))
  hlipdir(c3, c0, chba, c1, c2, cva, csp)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c3), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  h2hva(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhis2-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H)‚Üí((c0[+h]c1)[.ih]c2)=((c0[.ih]c2)[+](c1[.ih]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà CHilOLD
  ‚ä£ .ih =(.iOLD ` c3)
} = {
  mpan((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H), ((c0[+h]c1)[.ih]c2)=((c0[.ih]c2)[+](c1[.ih]c2)), c3 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hlipdir(c3, c0, chba, c1, c2, cva, csp)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c3), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  h2hva(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}

blocks.name: axhis3-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-his3 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhis3-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, csm, c1), csp, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, csp, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c3, chlo)
  -| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c3))
} = {
  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(co(c0, csm, c1), csp, c2), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, csp, c2))), wcel(c3, chlo))
  hlipass(c3, c0, c1, chba, c2, csm, csp)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c3), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  h2hsm(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhis3-zf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H)‚Üí((c0[.h]c1)[.ih]c2)=(c0[√ó](c1[.ih]c2)))
  ‚ä£ c3 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c3 ‚àà CHilOLD
  ‚ä£ .ih =(.iOLD ` c3)
} = {
  mpan((c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H), ((c0[.h]c1)[.ih]c2)=(c0[√ó](c1[.ih]c2)), c3 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hlipass(c3, c0, c1, chba, c2, csm, csp)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c3), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c3, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  h2hsm(c3)
  hlnvi(c3)
}

blocks.name: axhis4-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-his4 from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhis4-zf(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wne(c0, c0v)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, csp, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c1, chlo)
  -| wceq(csp, cfv(cdip, c1))
} = {
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, chba), wne(c0, c0v), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, csp, c0)), wcel(c1, chlo))
  hlipgt0(c1, c0, chba, c0v, csp)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c1), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  eqtr4i(c0v, cfv(cn0v, c1), cfv(cn0v, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axhis4-zf(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c0 ‚â† 0h)‚Üí 0[<](c0[.ih]c0))
  ‚ä£ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà CHilOLD
  ‚ä£ .ih =(.iOLD ` c1)
} = {
  mp3an1(c0 ‚àà ~H, c0 ‚â† 0h, 0[<](c0[.ih]c0), c1 ‚àà CHilOLD)
  hlipgt0(c1, c0, chba, c0v, csp)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c1), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  eqtr4i(c0v, (0vec ` c1), (0vec ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-h0v()
  fveq2i(cn0v, c1, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
}

blocks.name: axhcompl-zf
blocks.content: Derive axiom ~ ax-hcompl from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-May-2014.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axhcompl-zf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccauold), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wcel(c1, chlo)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, ccauold, cin(cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1)), co(chba, cmap, cn)), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, cin(cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1)), co(chba, cmap, cn))), wrex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)))))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wex(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))))), wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))))))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))))), wcel(c1, chlo), wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)))
  hlcompl(c1, c0, cfv(cims, c1), cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))))), wex(s0, wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)))))))
  eldm2g(s0, c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1)), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))))
  eximdv(s0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))))
  syl5bir(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wcel(cop(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), chba), wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0)))
  df-br(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0))
  jcad(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wi(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), chba)))
  mpan(wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wcel(cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)), cfv(ctopon, chba)))
  mp2b(wcel(cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)), cfv(ctopon, chba)), wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(cfv(cims, c1), cfv(cxmet, chba)))
  imsxmet(c1, cfv(cims, c1), chba)
  mopntopon(cfv(cims, c1), chba, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)))
  lmcl(cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)), chba, c0, cv(s0))
  biimprd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn))), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0)), wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1))), wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wb(wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0))))
  baib(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0)))
  bitri(wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0))), wbr(c0, cres(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), co(chba, cmap, cn)), cv(s0)))
  breqi(c0, chli, cv(s0), cres(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), co(chba, cmap, cn)))
  h2hlm(cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)), c1, cfv(cims, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)))
  elv(s0, wb(wbr(c0, cres(cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), co(chba, cmap, cn)), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, co(chba, cmap, cn)), wbr(c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), cv(s0)))))
  brres(cv(s0), universe, c0, cfv(clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))), co(chba, cmap, cn))
  elin(c0, cfv(ccau, cfv(cims, c1)), co(chba, cmap, cn))
  df-rex(s0, chba, wbr(c0, chli, cv(s0)))
  h2hcau(cfv(cims, c1), c1)
  hlnvi(c1)
  eqtr4i(chba, cfv(cba, c1), cfv(cba, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno)))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  eqid(cfv(cims, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clm, cfv(cmopn, cfv(cims, c1)))

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmopn, cfv(cims, c1))

thm axhcompl-zf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Cauchy ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ~H, c0[~~>v]s0))
  ‚ä£ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà CHilOLD
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eleq2s(c0, ccauold, ((Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚ãÇ(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ~H, c0[~~>v]s0))
  3imtr4i(c0 ‚àà((Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚ãÇ(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ~H, c0[~~>v]s0), (c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c0[~~>v]s0)))
  mpd((c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), ‚àÉ(s0,(s0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c0[~~>v]s0)), ‚àÉ(s0, < c0, s0 > ‚àà(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))))
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), ‚àÉ(s0, < c0, s0 > ‚àà(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))), c0 ‚àà dom((~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))))
  sylancr((c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), c0 ‚àà dom((~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))), c1 ‚àà CHilOLD, c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1)))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1)), c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))
  hlcompl(c1, c0, (IndMet ` c1), (MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1)), c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï), (c0 ‚àà dom((~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0, < c0, s0 > ‚àà(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))))))
  eldm2g(s0, c0, (Cau `(IndMet ` c1)), (~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))))
  eximdv(s0, (c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), < c0, s0 > ‚àà(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))), (s0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c0[~~>v]s0))
  syl5bir((c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), < c0, s0 > ‚àà(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))), (s0 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c0[~~>v]s0), c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0)
  df-br(c0, (~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))), s0)
  jcad((c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0, s0 ‚àà ~H, c0[~~>v]s0)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), (c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0 ‚Üí s0 ‚àà ~H))
  mpan(c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0, s0 ‚àà ~H, (MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))‚àà(TopOn ` ~H))
  mp2b((MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))‚àà(TopOn ` ~H), c1 ‚àà NrmCVec, (IndMet ` c1)‚àà(*Met ` ~H))
  imsxmet(c1, (IndMet ` c1), chba)
  mopntopon((IndMet ` c1), chba, (MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))
  lmcl((MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)), chba, c0, s0)
  biimprd((c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1))‚àß c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)), c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0, c0[~~>v]s0)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1)), c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï), (c0[~~>v]s0 ‚Üî c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0))
  baib(c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï), c0[~~>v]s0, c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0)
  bitri(c0[~~>v]s0, (c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)‚àß c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0), c0[((~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))|`(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))]s0)
  breqi(c0, chli, s0, ((~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))|`(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)))
  h2hlm((MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)), c1, (IndMet ` c1))
  eqid((MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))
  elv(s0, (c0[((~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))|`(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))]s0 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï)‚àß c0[(~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))]s0)))
  brres(s0, universe, c0, (~~>t `(MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1))), (~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))
  elin(c0, (Cau `(IndMet ` c1)), (~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))
  df-rex(s0, chba, c0[~~>v]s0)
  h2hcau((IndMet ` c1), c1)
  hlnvi(c1)
  eqtr4i(chba, (BaseSet ` c1), (BaseSet ` < < +h, .h >, normh >))
  df-hba()
  fveq2i(cba, c1, < < +h, .h >, normh >)
  eqid((IndMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, clm, (MetOpen `(IndMet ` c1)))
  diff.clm.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmopn, (IndMet ` c1))
  diff.cmopn.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà(Cau `(IndMet ` c1)), c0 ‚àà(~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (Cau `(IndMet ` c1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccau, (IndMet ` c1))
  diff.ccau.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cims, c1)
  diff.cims.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (~H[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))
  diff.co.s(s0, chba, cmap, cn)
  diff.chba.s(s0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
}
